Report.name: CuttingTagInitDetail
Report.query: SELECT TagID, OrId, PO, StyleNo, CutJobID, CutNo, FLRSrNo, BundleID, BundleCode, ColorCode, Color, SizeID, Size, CutPanelID, Panel, LineID, MachineID, BoxID, DepartmentID, Location, LastScanTimestamp, IssuedFromCuttingAt, ReceivedInCuttingAt, MachineCode, MachineDescription, LineCode, LineDescription, DepartmentName, PrintedAt, PrintedBy FROM dbo.TagTrackingDetails WHERE 1=1

Report.name: CuttingWorkOrderDateWiseWIP
Report.query: With DistinctOrderQtys as ( SELECT Distinct WorkOrder,PO,Buymonth, ColorCode,CustomerCode, ORderQty FROM [dbo].[DataForCuttingWIP] ), WorkOrderGroup as ( Select WorkORder,BuyMonth,CustomerCode,Sum (OrderQty) OrderQty From DistinctOrderQtys Group by WorkORder,BuyMonth,CustomerCode ), TillDateData as ( Select cw.WorkOrder,cw.BuyMonth,cw.CustomerCode, isnull(CompanyId,'NCL') CompanyId,WOG.OrderQty, Sum(CuttingQty) CuttingQty, Sum(EmbroiderySendQty) EmbroiderySendQty, Sum(EmbroideryReceivedQty) EmbroideryReceivedQty, Sum(PrintingSendQty) PrintingSendQty, Sum(PrintingReceivedQty) PrintingReceivedQty, Sum(SewingIssuanceQty) SewingIssuanceQty from [dbo].[DataForCuttingWIP] cw Left Join WorkOrderGroup WOG on cw.WorkOrder = WOG.WorkOrder and cw.BuyMonth = WOG.BuyMonth and cw.CustomerCode = WOG.CustomerCode Group By cw.WorkOrder,cw.BuyMonth,cw.CustomerCode, isnull(CompanyId,'NCL'),WOG.OrderQty ) Select cw.WorkOrder,cw.BuyMonth,cw.CustomerCode, isnull(cw.CompanyId,'NCL') CompanyId,WOG.OrderQty, TDD.CuttingQty as TillDateCuttingQty, TDD.EmbroiderySendQty as TillDateEmbroiderySendQty, TDD.EmbroideryReceivedQty TillDateEmbroideryReceivedQty, TDD.PrintingSendQty as TillDatePrintingSendQty, TDD.PrintingReceivedQty as TillDatePrintingReceivedQty, TDD.SewingIssuanceQty as TillDateSewingIssuanceQty, Sum(cw.CuttingQty) CuttingQty, Sum(cw.EmbroiderySendQty) EmbroiderySendQty, Sum(cw.EmbroideryReceivedQty) EmbroideryReceivedQty, Sum(cw.PrintingSendQty) PrintingSendQty, Sum(cw.PrintingReceivedQty) PrintingReceivedQty, Sum(cw.SewingIssuanceQty) SewingIssuanceQty from [dbo].[DataForCuttingWIP] cw Left Join WorkOrderGroup WOG on cw.WorkOrder = WOG.WorkOrder and cw.BuyMonth = WOG.BuyMonth and cw.CustomerCode = WOG.CustomerCode Left Join TillDateData TDD on cw.WorkOrder = TDD.WorkOrder and cw.BuyMonth = TDD.BuyMonth and cw.CustomerCode = TDD.CustomerCode WHERE 1=1

Report.name: CuttingWorkOrderWIP
Report.query: With DistinctOrderQtys as ( SELECT Distinct WorkOrder,PO,Buymonth, ColorCode,CustomerCode, ORderQty FROM [dbo].[DataForCuttingWIP] ), WorkOrderGroup as ( Select WorkORder,BuyMonth,CustomerCode,Sum (OrderQty) OrderQty From DistinctOrderQtys Group by WorkORder,BuyMonth,CustomerCode ) Select cw.WorkOrder,cw.BuyMonth,cw.CustomerCode, isnull(CompanyId,'NCL') CompanyId,WOG.OrderQty, Sum(CuttingQty) CuttingQty, Sum(EmbroiderySendQty) EmbroiderySendQty, Sum(EmbroideryReceivedQty) EmbroideryReceivedQty, Sum(PrintingSendQty) PrintingSendQty, Sum(PrintingReceivedQty) PrintingReceivedQty, Sum(SewingIssuanceQty) SewingIssuanceQty from [dbo].[DataForCuttingWIP] cw Left Join WorkOrderGroup WOG on cw.WorkOrder = WOG.WorkOrder and cw.BuyMonth = WOG.BuyMonth and cw.CustomerCode = WOG.CustomerCode WHERE 1=1

Report.name: BoxMaintenanceReport
Report.query: SELECT CompanyID, NodeName, NodeIP, BoxID, BoxCode, CurrentAddress, ZoneTopic, LineID, LineCode, MachineCode, MachineDescription, WorkerID, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, BoxStatus, DownReasonSubCategoryID, DownCategoryName, SubCategoryName, Remarks, CreatedAt, MaintenanceStartedAt, UpdatedAt, CASE WHEN CreatedAt = UpdatedAt AND BoxStatus != 'Running' THEN DATEDIFF(MINUTE, CreatedAt, GETDATE()) ELSE DATEDIFF(MINUTE, CreatedAt, UpdatedAt) END AS NewDownTime, PingTime, DownTime, CASE WHEN CreatedAt = UpdatedAt AND BoxStatus != 'Running' THEN GETDATE() ELSE UpdatedAt END AS MaintenanceTime, MinutesSinceUpdate, BoxState FROM [Reports].[BoxMaintenanceLog] WHERE 1=1

Report.name: OperationWiseScanning

Report.groupBy: GROUP BY ScanningDate, LineCode, StyleNo, OperationID, OperationDescription, DepartmentName, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, OpSeq, IsFirst, IsLast

Report.name: SAMCalculationReport
Report.query: WITH CTE_Worker AS ( SELECT CompanyId, BrId, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, LoginDate, DepartmentName, MIN(LoginTime) AS EntryTime, MAX(LastBundleScanTime) AS ExitTime FROM [dbo].[WorkerEfficiencyDataSet] WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY CompanyId, BrId, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, LoginDate, DepartmentName ) SELECT CompanyId, BrId, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, DepartmentName, LoginDate, EntryTime, ExitTime, CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, EntryTime, ExitTime) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / 60 AS HoursWorked, CASE WHEN DATENAME(WEEKDAY, LoginDate) = 'Friday' THEN CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, EntryTime, ExitTime) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / 60 ELSE 0 END AS FridayHours, DATEDIFF(MINUTE, EntryTime, ExitTime) AS AvailableSAM, CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, ExitTime) > @LastHour OR (DATEPART(HOUR, ExitTime) = @LastHour AND DATEPART(MINUTE, ExitTime) > 0) THEN CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, DATEADD(MINUTE, @LastHour * 60, CAST(CONVERT(DATE, LoginDate) AS DATETIME)), ExitTime) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / 60 ELSE 0 END AS OvertimeHours, CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, ExitTime) < @LastHour THEN CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, EntryTime, ExitTime) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / 60 ELSE CAST(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, EntryTime, DATEADD(HOUR, @LastHour, CAST(CAST(EntryTime AS DATE) AS DATETIME))) AS DECIMAL(10,2)) / 60 END AS PreOvertimeHours FROM CTE_Worker

Report.name: WorkerStrengthReport
Report.query: SELECT [BRID], [DepartmentDescription], [Designation], [InDate], COUNT([EmpCode]) AS TotalWorkers, SUM(CASE WHEN [AttendanceCode] = 'P' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TotalPresent, SUM(CASE WHEN [AttendanceCode] = 'A' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TotalAbsent FROM [dbo].[WorkerAttendance] WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY [BRID], [DepartmentDescription], [Designation], [InDate] ORDER BY [BRID], [DepartmentDescription], [Designation]

Report.name: QualityCheckReport
Report.query: SELECT OrId, PO, CutNo, BundleCode, Buyer, PieceID, PieceNumber, LineID, LineCode, LineDescription, StatusDescription, UserName, CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ScanningDate, 103) AS ScanningDate FROM dbo.QualityDataSet WHERE 1=1

Report.name: InlineRFTReport
Report.query: WITH CTE_Audit AS ( SELECT FORMAT(ScanningTime, 'yyyy-MM') AS Month, LineCode, WorkerID, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, COUNT(AuditFormSessionID) AS TotalRounds, COUNT(CASE WHEN RoundColor = 'Green' THEN AuditFormSessionID END) AS GreenCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN RoundColor <> 'Green' OR RoundColor IS NULL THEN AuditFormSessionID END) AS NotGreenCount FROM [dbo].[AuditFormDataSet] WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY FORMAT(ScanningTime, 'yyyy-MM'), LineCode, WorkerID, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription ) SELECT Month, LineCode, WorkerID, WorkerCode, WorkerDescription, TotalRounds, GreenCount, NotGreenCount, CASE WHEN TotalRounds = 0 THEN 0 ELSE CAST(GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds AS DECIMAL(5,2)) END AS RFT_Percentage, CASE WHEN TotalRounds = 0 THEN 'No Data' WHEN (GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds) = 100 THEN 'RFT Operator 0%' WHEN (GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds) BETWEEN 95 AND 99.99 THEN '1% - 5% Excellent' WHEN (GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds) BETWEEN 90 AND 94.99 THEN '6% - 10% Good' WHEN (GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds) BETWEEN 85 AND 89.99 THEN '11% - 15% Satisfactory' WHEN (GreenCount * 100.0 / TotalRounds) < 85 THEN '16% & Above Need Improvement' ELSE 'Unknown' END AS RFT_Category FROM CTE_Audit ORDER BY Month, LineCode

Report.name: HourlyProductionEndline
Report.query: WITH HourlyProduction AS ( SELECT LineCode, SectionCode, SectionDescription, ScanningDate AS ProductionDate, HourSlot, COUNT(CASE WHEN StatusDescription = 'FTQ' THEN PieceID ELSE NULL END) AS FTQ, COUNT(CASE WHEN StatusDescription = 'Passed/Defected' THEN PieceID ELSE NULL END) AS ClearedAfterRework FROM dbo.QualityDataSet WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY LineCode, SectionCode, SectionDescription, ScanningDate, HourSlot ) SELECT LineCode, SectionCode, SectionDescription, ProductionDate, HourSlot AS HourOrder, CASE WHEN HourSlot BETWEEN 6 AND 16 THEN CONCAT(HourSlot, ':00') ELSE 'Overtime' END AS HourSlot, (FTQ + ClearedAfterRework) AS PieceCount FROM HourlyProduction ORDER BY HourOrder
